column2: This is NXAI. Would you like to learn about our smart outbound calling powered by large language models?
No problem! It takes 1 minute. Our AI makes calls for you—no human needed. Interested?

column1: Not really. We use humans now.
column2: Our AI cuts costs by 50% for many companies. Can we share a quick case study?
It handles repetitive calls, so your team focuses on big deals. Want to hear more?
Sure! Just one question—are you open to saving time on calls?

column1: Yes, but not sure about AI.
column2: Our AI talks naturally, like we’re doing now! Would a free trial help?
A consultant will discuss that soon. Any other concerns today?
Understood! We’ll follow up next week. Thanks!
